commentBody:
Ms. Collins, as I chuckled my way through your column, I was brought up short by your mention that Robert Kraft, the New England Patriots owner, felt the need to visit Trump Tower to presumably bend the knee before The Presence.

Theresa May? Two Trump Towers in Istanbul? Manhattan without a golf course? What about my Patriots? Now that the country's on its way to hell, what about football? If Kraft Industries is in the bag, we're in far worse shape than I thought.
